import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container' import AppBar from '@material-ui/core/AppBar'; import Toolbar from '@material-ui/core/Toolbar'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Link from '@material-ui/core/Link'; import { getAll } from '../services/cargo.service'; export default _ => { const [cargo, setCargo] = useState('Nenhum cargo'); useEffect(async => { getAll().then(response => { setCargo(response.data); console.log('resposta',response.data) }) }, []) return (
SGU SGU
Cargos Perfis Usuários
Cargos Perfis Usuários
{ cargo[0].nome }
) }
